DOC.brief_title: Long Term Follow-up Study With Keppra XR ( Levetiracetam XR ) Partial Seizures
DOC.criteria: Subjects randomize study N01280 [ NCT00419094 ] , complete 2 week titration period Subjects meet inclusion/exclusion criterion N01280 [ NCT00419094 ] Subjects discontinue prior end titration period
